title: Handling
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Employees - Training of
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Materials handling
description: Episode number 3 of Series "Accidents don't happen". A brief quiz on how, or how not, to handle heavy loads. In a two-minute test the audience is invited to spot nine mistakes in handling methods. Men are seen working with packing cases, cement sacks, oil drums and metal rods - and having trouble. After the test, the same workers are shown doing their jobs the right way.
